#summary Project central page.

= Language =

Our team consist mainly of Czech and Slovak contributors. Not all of them speak English so most of the documentation is in Czech.

However we know that we need support from all over the world. We are trying to maintain the important information in English as well. If you are missing any information in English, just contact us and we will translate it.

= Design Plan =

For description of what we are doing (kits, vehicles and assets description) check the [https://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?key=0Am9bkWZ1AmlndHgxMFRCMmszUERTV3RneU1qLUdwaGc&hl=en&authkey=CPD-paMN&pli=1#gid=0 Design Plan]. 

= Project Plan =

We hope that the project can be created and ready for approval (by DEV team) in one year. To trac the development process this time is divided into several phases - see the [ProjectPlan Project Plan].

We want to work in 2 week based iterations. Each iteration will be precisely planned at the end of the preceding iteration. Iteration overview is provided by the [https://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?key=tD1_GGBxOW3U0aJxFJpBKrw&authkey=CJf4nbcK#gid=0 Time Sheet].
